Content:
I got a few questions by the way.

1. When is token sale

Did you get permission from KMD to use those fees towards rewards? Or how are you able to offer the fees at bdex rates as well as rewarding CC holders? üòÆ

Author: Deleted User#0000

Author: barv#0867
Content: @Seko we will make a generic interface so we can easily integrate gateways. We'll start with gateways we know in NL & Germany. Feel free to submit you're preferred ones. Ideally they allow you to directly send funds to your own wallet.

Author: barv#0867
Content:
@Deleted User 1. We're in private sale mode now (second round) >> The price for the second round is set to ‚Ç¨0,0167 (1.67 cent) per CC. We aim for ‚Ç¨100,000 for 6,000,000 CC coins per investor. We reserved 12M CC coins for this round.
The third round for the remaining 6M coins will start 2018 October 1st. CC coins will be priced ‚Ç¨0,03 (3 cents) each and sold in smaller batches. Leftovers will be sold public via liquidity providers for ‚Ç¨0,04 to ‚Ç¨0,05 (4 to 5 cents).

Author: barv#0867
Content: 2. If you invest in the second round, you will earn ~$1000 per month for every ~$1000 invested if we enjoy 500k to 600k active users

Author: barv#0867
Content: 3. We use BarterDEX protocol. There is a GUI part integrated in the fee of BarterDEX (10% of the 0,15%) which we get. Next to that we earn on promotions in the app and on spread with optimised LP nodes

Author: barv#0867
Content: 4. > spot on

Author: barv#0867
Content: I don't get this one  "be able to claim rewards/gas yourself as you are the only one in control of your own private keys" so you would need to explain. What we mean is that app users can collect their bags full of coins without ever needing third party trust. So it's not about the rewards.
